trans-unit.source: Configures an HTTP handler for a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 配置 Web 应用程序的 HTTP 处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The HttpHandlersSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `httpHandlers` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: HttpHandlersSection 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`httpHandlers`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of a group that includes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction> and the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection> types.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是包括的组的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection>类型。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HttpHandlersSection can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> section property whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> HttpHandlersSection 可以读取和写入信息 from 和 to 根据<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值为<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>。</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition>的部分属性</xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>的配置文件的相关部分

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref> class.
The HttpHandlersSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: HttpHandlersSection 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.

Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"></xref> collection of <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> objects contained by the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"></xref>集合<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref>包含的对象<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlersSection"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The Handlers property collection returned by this method does not refer to any actual element in the underlying configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的处理程序属性集合不是基础的配置文件中任何实际元素指。

trans-unit.source: It is a <xref:System.Web.Configuration> construct that allows easy access to the handlers it contains.
trans-unit.target: 它是<xref:System.Web.Configuration>到它所包含的处理程序的方便访问的构造。</xref:System.Web.Configuration>

trans-unit.source: This is a common pattern for handling the elements of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种常见模式，用于处理配置文件的元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerActionCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.HttpHandlerAction"></xref> objects, or handlers.
